ErrorMessages.error: VXIinterpreterRun: Invalid parameter for URI.
VXIinterpreterRun: Unable to allocate memory.
VXIinterpreterRun: Failed to open
VXIinterpreterRun: Failed to read the URI's content.
VXIinterpreterRun: Failed to parse the URI's content. Make sure that this document consists of valid VXML.
VXIinterpreterRun: Internal error (Unexpected return value during parsing). Contact Vocalocity technical support.
VXIinterpreterRun: Unhandled exception
VXIinterpreterRun: Unable to open the URI with the specified encoding
VXIinterpreterRun: Function aborted due to fatal error. This message should be preceeded by one or more error messages explaining why this occurred.
VXIinterpreterRun: Maximum documents count exceeded. There is probably an infinite loop of in your VXML document.
VXIinterpreterRun: Maximum depth exceeded. This may be caused by circular references in <subdialog>
VXIinterpreterRun: Severe error encountered during ECMA script interpretation.
VXIinterpreterRun: The telephony layer could not successfully disconnect.
VXIinterpreterRun: The application URI cannot include a fragment. The URI had the form "uri-string#fragment". Fragments are not allowed.
VXIinterpreterRun: The grammar URI cannot include a fragment. The fragment was ignored. The URI had the form "uri-string#fragment". Fragments are not allowed.
VXIinterpreterRun: Maximum loop count exceeded. There is probably an infinite loop of in your VXML document.
VXIinterpreterRun: Duplicate form item name. Form item names must be unique.
VXIinterpreterRun: <param> elements passed to a <subdialog> must have corresponding <var> elements. Make sure that there is a var for each specified param.
VXIinterpreterRun: <var> names cannot contain periods or scope prefixes.
VXIinterpreterRun: Invalid argument for platform defaults location.
VXIinterpreterRun: Unable to parse platform defaults due to an exception.
VXIinterpreterRun: Unable to parse platform defaults due to an error.semantic.missing_generic_defaults exception.
VXIinterpreterRun: invalid maxnbest value, deliberately set to 1.
VXIinterpreterRun: Could not locate form on local jump.
VXIinterpreterRun: The VXIvalue::VXIVector implementation appears broken. Contact the provider of the VXIvalue library.
VXIinterpreterRun: The VXIrecInterface::Recognize function appears broken: REC_RAW contents must be all strings. Contact the provider of the VXIrecInterface.
VXIinterpreterRun: The VXIrecInterface::Recognize function appears broken: REC_CONF contents must be all floats. Contact the provider of the VXIrecInterface.
VXIinterpreterRun: The VXIrecInterface::Recognize function appears broken: REC_KEYS contents must be all strings. Contact the provider of the VXIrecInterface.
VXIinterpreterRun: The VXIrecInterface::Recognize function appears broken: REC_VALUES must be non-null. Contact the provider of the VXIrecInterface.
VXIinterpreterRun: The VXIrecInterface::Recognize function appears broken: REC_VALUES contents have illegal type. Contact the provider of the VXIrecInterface.
VXIinterpreterRun: The VXIrecInterface::Recognize function appears broken: unable to extract single key from interpretations. Contact the provider of the VXIrecInterface.
VXIinterpreterRun: The VXIrecInterface::Recognize function appears broken: REC_KEY contents not all unique. Contact the provider of the VXIrecInterface.
VXIinterpreterRun: The VXIrecInterface::Recognize function appears broken. Contact the provider of the VXIrecInterface.
VXIinterpreterRun: The VXIrecInterface::Record function appears broken. Contact the provider of the VXIrecInterface.
VIXinterpreterRun: The VXIrecInterface::Recognize function returned a result with an unsupported type. Contact the provider of the VXIrecInterface.
VIXinterpreterRun: The VXIrecInterface::Recognize function returned an empty result. Contact the provider of the VXIrecInterface.
VIXinterpreterRun: The VXIrecInterface::Recognize function returned an invalid result. Contact the provider of the VXIrecInterface.
VIXinterpreterRun: The VXIrecInterface::Recognize result did not contain a valid grammar. Contact the provider of the VXIrecInterface.
VXIinterpreterRun: The VXItelInterface::TransferBlind function appears broken. Contact the provider of the VXItelInterface.
VXIinterpreterRun: The VXItelInterface::TransferBridge function appears broken.

VXIinterpreterRun: The VXIobjectInterface::Execute function appears broken. Contact the provider of the VXIobjectInterface.

VXIinterpreterRun: Internal error. Contact the provider of the VXIinterpreterInterface.
